alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Blaine, southeastern Hill and northeastern Chouteau Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Parker School, or 16 miles south of Havre, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Havre, Chinook, Parker School, Agency, Azure, Sangrey, Lohman, Lloyd, and Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
